message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work out a better deal later if you want.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I think 60% is a fairer starting point.
I'm willing to negotiate, but 60% is too low for me. I'll accept a 70/30 split. Let's make a deal.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's try for a 50/50 split.
